main: ^I am the wise grand wizard, what brings you to my shop today?
^Do you have the spellbook of portals
^This witch said he can bring me home with the book
chosen_portal: ^Of course but why would a duck need a portal spellbook
^To get home.. This witch promised to help me.
chosen_witch: ^I can help you with this but it will cost 5 gold coins
^(try to persuade to give the book for free)
Chosen_mayhem: ^I can't help you with that Im sorry.
^I was kidding, I need it to get back home
^I was joking, this witch promised me to help me get back to my realm
chosen_persuade: ^Please, I don't have the gold and I need to get back home.
^JUST GIVE ME IT AND WE WON'T HAVE PROBLEMS!!!
endDialogue: ^I could just smite you, if I wanted.
endDialogueplease: ^Im sorry but I can't give it for free
